review: The Amazon Fire TV Stick surprised me by its voice search technology and its speed is amazing. This little gadget works great and the video quality is excellent. At 1080p the movies or TV shows that you play on this product looks very awesome. I like a lot. I am so satisfied that I bought the Amazon Fire TV Box too.
author: Leonardo Adames

review: Convenient device, lots of options.  However it's range apparently leaves something to be desired.  Streaming Netflix through it, the picture often freezes while the audio continues.  Then the picture runs in fast forward until they re-sync.  This isn't a problem with my other streaming device, and the two are 2 feet from each other.  It makes watching a bother.
author: D Leveille
